## Active Technologies

- Local file system (existing document persistence layer via Electron main process) (002-mermaid-diagrams)

- TypeScript 5.x with strict mode, React 19 + Electron 39.x, React 19.0.0-rc, Tailwind CSS v4.0.0, @fontsource packages (Inter, Source Serif 4, JetBrains Mono) (002-interface-styling)
